titleStmt.title: A particular relation of the raising of the siege of Vienna, and the defeat of the Turkish army on the 12th of September, 1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: blurred print with slight loss of text.
